page.title: 05TRANSPORT
page.content: All of the children that I know have bicycles .We ride over to see our friends at evenings and weekends.Some of the pupils at our school come by mnibus if they live out in the country.Mr.Kerslake owns and drives this.He lives in Holcombe.All of our families own cars.I think that most families that I know have 2 cars.There is a bus which goes to Tiverton twice a day from Westleigh,Burlescombe and Holcombe Rogus.This is run by Kingdom's.A bus goes to Taunton twice a week.A bus run by Blue Venture takes the children to Uffculme School.The Grand Western Canal is about a mile from our school.The main railway line to London goes through one corner of our area.We can see the trains coming out of White Ball tunnel from one of our classroom windows.
